required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Preventing Cognitive Decline With Metformin:: The MetMemory Study

collaborator.agency: National Health and Medical Research Council, Australia

brief_summary.textblock: A randomised control study of metformin in people with mild cognitive impairment and without diabetes mellitus to determine effects on cognitive decline and neuroimaging over 3 years.

detailed_description.textblock: A randomised placebo-control study of metformin in people with mild cognitive impairment and without diabetes mellitus to determine effects on cognitive decline, neuroimaging and biomarkers over 3 years.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: memory domain Z-score, derived from the following neuropsychological tests: i. Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test (RAVLT); ii. Total Learning and Delayed recall; iii. the Logical Memory Story A- Immediate Recall; and iv. Delayed Recall tests.

executive function domain Z-score, derived from the following neuropsychological tests: i. Alphabet test; ii. D-KEFS Stroop; iii. Trail Making Test Part B; iv. Weschler Adult Intelligence Scale-IV (WAIS-IV) Digit Span Backward test.

secondary_outcome.measure: changes in processing speed domain Z-score
secondary_outcome.description: processing speed domain measured by the i. WAIS-IV Coding; and ii. Trail Making Test part B

secondary_outcome.measure: changes in language performance domain Z-score
secondary_outcome.description: language performance domain measured by the Category Fluency (Animals) neuropsychological test

secondary_outcome.measure: changes in attention performance domain Z-score
secondary_outcome.description: attention performance domain Z-score, measured by the WAIS-IV Digit Span Forward neuropsychological test

secondary_outcome.measure: changes in Cogstate brief battery performance Z-score
secondary_outcome.description: computerised cognition testing using the on-line test, the Cogstate brief battery (CBB)

secondary_outcome.measure: changes in total brain volume (cubic millimetres)
secondary_outcome.description: total grey and white matter volume
volume of the right and left hippocampal regions of the brain
volume of the right and left parahippocampal regions of the brain

secondary_outcome.measure: changes in brain white matter hyperintensity number
secondary_outcome.description: the number of white matter hyperintensities visualised in bain imaging by magnetic resonance imaging

secondary_outcome.measure: changes in cerebral blood flow (mL / 100 g / min)
secondary_outcome.description: Cerebral blood flow will be measured using arterial spin labelling

secondary_outcome.measure: changes in cerebral amyloid tracer standardized uptake value ratio (SUVR)
secondary_outcome.description: standardized uptake value ratio of amyloid tracer using positron emission tomography

secondary_outcome.measure: changes in cognitive performance Z-score using the NIH tool box
secondary_outcome.description: The NIH Toolbox currently contains the following cognitive tests: Flanker, Pattern Comparison, Picture Sequence Memory and Dimensional Change Card Sort.

secondary_outcome.measure: change in BOLD (blood-oxygen-level-dependent) time-series signals measured by functional magnetic resonance imaging
secondary_outcome.description: change blood oxygen-level-dependent time-series signals, measured by functional MRI

secondary_outcome.measure: changes in biomarkers, including fasting glucose (mmol/L) and insulin (mIU/L), insulin resistance (HOMA-IR index)
secondary_outcome.description: fasting glucose (mmol/L) and insulin (mIU/L), insulin resistance (HOMA-IR index)
